title: Communication & Engagement
checklist: Greets patient, introduces self & clarifies role
Uses clear, jargon-free language at an appropriate pace
Employs an empathetic, respectful tone throughout
Validates patient concerns aloud (e.g. “I understand this is worrying…”)
Practises active listening (paraphrases / summaries to confirm)
Avoids interruptions and negative non-verbals (eye-rolling, sighs)
Adapts explanations to patient’s emotional & educational level
Periodically checks understanding or invites questions
Responds appropriately to verbal **and** non-verbal patient cues
